name: The Reggae Operation
storyline: One day, stuck and bored at home in Roboenza quarantine, Dr. Wily discovers to his horror that Dr. Light is performing new and exciting research on Guts Man technology. Unwilling to see his favorite robot master "tarnished", infiltrate the facility wherein the research is underway. But with extensive ground defenses that make a normal attack difficult, the doctor is forced to undertake desperate measures.... and to modify his crotchety robot bird, Reggae, into a fighting machine. Can he pull off this very special mission and make Dr. Wily proud?
summary: The Reggae Operation is a short four stage Mega Man fangame. Fly with Reggae through four stages of arcade action, defeating complex bosses and using unique weapons! And please, read the readme.
